titleInfo.title: The Maschler-Perles solution: 2 simple proofs for superadditivity

mods.abstract: The Maschler-Perles solution is the unique bargaining solution which is superadditive and satisfies the usual covariance properties. We provide two proofs for superadditivity that do not rely on the standard traveling time.
